testimonials.title: Our Students Love Us!

testimonial1.text: StepUp didn't just teach my son English‚Äîthey made him love learning. His progress has been incredible.

testimonial2.text: I love the classes at StepUp! They're fun and engaging, with something new to learn every time.
testimonial2.name: Marcia

testimonial3.text: The school has excellent facilities, patient and caring teachers who are incredibly supportive and friendly! The curriculum is wonderfully organized. I feel completely comfortable learning English here.
testimonial3.name: Anonymous

testimonial4.text: Such a comfortable environment with excellent classes. The teacher is extremely kind, treats all students well and explains everything clearly. Communication with the school is outstanding‚Äîalways professional and courteous. After just a few months, I already notice a significant improvement in my English. Truly exceptional.
testimonial4.name: Kelssy

testimonial5.text: I've learned so much English at this school. The teachers are incredibly friendly and attentive, which has greatly benefited my professional life.
testimonial5.name: Gabriel Ferreira

testimonial6.text: Wonderful school üòç my son absolutely loves it
testimonial6.name: D√©bora Santos

testimonial8.text: Well-structured school with a genuine focus on student learning.

About.title: About Us
About.subtitle: Discover who we are, our methodology, and why we're the right choice for your English learning journey.

history.title: Our Story
history.quote: We believe learning English should be an enjoyable and transformative journey.
history.text1: StepUp was founded in 2024 by passionate English teachers frustrated with traditional methods that failed to truly engage students.
history.text2: Our journey began in Montijo with a vision to transform language learning into a more engaging, personalized, and effective experience. From day one, our essence remains unchanged: teaching practical English connected to the real world.
history.text3: Today, StepUp proudly helps dozens of students achieve fluency and confidence in English, opening doors to personal and professional opportunities.

methodology.title: Our Methodology
methodology.subtitle: At StepUp, we believe effective language learning combines theory and practice in a welcoming and stimulating environment.

communicative.title: Communicative
communicative.description: We prioritize conversation from day one, creating an immersive environment where students are encouraged to express themselves in English from the very first class.

personalized.title: Personalized
personalized.description: We tailor content and pacing to each student's specific needs and goals, ensuring efficient and targeted learning.

dynamic.title: Dynamic
dynamic.description: We utilize diverse resources and interactive activities to keep classes engaging and stimulating, facilitating natural knowledge absorption.

teachers.title: Qualified Teachers
teachers.subtitle: Our team consists of passionate teaching professionals with extensive experience in language education.

pf1.name: Teacher 1
pf1.description: Certified teacher with over 10 years of experience teaching English to all age groups.

pf2.name: Teacher 2
pf2.description: Specialist in international exam preparation with training in England.

pf3.name: Teacher 3
pf3.description: Native American English teacher experienced in Business English and conversation skills.

pf4.name: Teacher 4
pf4.description: Specialist in teaching children through playful and interactive methodologies.

location.title: Our Location
location.subtitle: Visit our school in the heart of Montijo and discover the perfect environment for learning English.

cta.title: Ready to begin your journey?
cta.subtitle: Book a free trial class and discover why StepUp is the right choice for your English learning.

Services.title: Our Services
Services.subtitle: Connecting you to the best learning opportunities
Services.description: We offer services that go beyond traditional teaching, focusing on each student's specific needs. Whether you're looking for tutoring, English instruction, exam preparation, or extracurricular activities, you've come to the right place.

tutoring.title: Academic Tutoring
tutoring.description: Our tutoring sessions help children and teenagers who need additional support with school subjects.

exams.title: Exam Preparation
exams.description: If your goal is to excel in exams and certifications, our specialized preparation program is perfect for you.

features.certifications: English certifications including TOEFL, IELTS, and Cambridge
features.specific: Specialized tests for exchange or academic programs

activities.title: Extracurricular Activities
activities.description: We offer complementary activities that enhance learning and promote well-rounded development.

features.events: Cultural events and competitions to encourage language use

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: Contact us to discover how we can support your development.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.subtitle: We're here to answer all your questions. Reach out to discover how we can help with your English learning journey.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services.
faq.q1: How do I book a trial class?
faq.a1: You can book a free trial class through our contact form, by phone, or by visiting our school in person.
faq.a2: Adult classes run for 90 minutes, while children's and teenagers' classes are 60 minutes long.
faq.q3: Do you offer certification exam preparation?
faq.a3: Yes, we offer specialized courses for exam preparation including Cambridge, IELTS, TOEFL, and other international certificates.
faq.a4: Classes are scheduled weekly at the same day and time. While rescheduling individual sessions isn't possible, we offer additional practice classes for students needing extra support.

children.title: English for Children
children.description: Our children's program introduces English through fun and interactive activities, respecting each child's learning pace.
children.underDevelopment: This page is under development. Detailed information about our children's English program will be available soon.
children.intro: We understand how important it is for parents to find a course that combines learning, fun, and real results. We help children develop English naturally and effectively, with specialized attention for different age groups.
children.approach: Our teaching approach respects each child's individual pace. We use playful activities, music, games, and stories to make learning English interactive and enjoyable. We create a welcoming environment where children feel confident to explore a new language.

playful.title: Playful Activities
playful.description: Make learning natural and fun while stimulating creativity and engagement.

music.title: Music
music.description: Enhances pronunciation, vocabulary, and listening skills in an engaging way.

games.title: Games
games.description: Develop quick thinking, vocabulary building, and English interaction.

stories.title: Stories
stories.description: Build comprehension, vocabulary, and cultural awareness through engaging narratives.

preKids.title: Pre-Kids (Ages 4-6)
preKids.description: Our Pre-Kids course is designed for children ages 4-6, during a crucial developmental stage. At this age, we focus on essential skills including:
skills: Recognition of basic English sounds and words.
Development of motor and cognitive skills through hands-on activities.
Introduction to everyday expressions and foundational vocabulary.

kids.title: Kids (Ages 7-10)
kids.description: Our Kids course serves children ages 7-10, focusing on oral communication, listening comprehension, and expanded vocabulary. Children learn to:
skills: Form simple sentences and express basic ideas in English.
Participate in interactive games that encourage using English in everyday situations.
Progress with personalized support that respects their individual learning journey.

cta.title: Want to give your child a solid language foundation?
cta.description: Contact us today! Our team will happily answer your questions and help you choose the ideal course.

teenagers.title: English for Teenagers
teenagers.description: Our teenage courses progressively develop language skills, focusing on communication and preparation for advanced proficiency.
teenagers.underDevelopment: This page is under development. Detailed information about our teenage English program will be available soon.
teenagers.intro: Prepare for the future with a course designed specifically for young people eager to develop their English skills!
teenagers.approach: Our method encourages creativity, teamwork, and confidence in using English. We focus on interactive, practical classes where teenagers can express themselves in a supportive and stimulating environment.

interactive.title: Interactive classes
interactive.description: Activities that blend learning with enjoyment.

exams.title: Exam preparation
exams.description: Support for certifications like TOEFL and Cambridge.

communication.title: Communication focus
communication.description: Practical conversation skills for everyday and academic situations.

teens.title: Teens (Ages 12-17)
teens.description: Specially developed for teenagers wanting to enhance their English skills, focusing on:
skills: Development of oral and written communication skills.
Preparation for real-world situations and international exams.
Integration of technology and multimedia resources to enrich learning.

cta.title: Ready to invest in your teenager's future?
cta.description: Contact us to discover how our teenage program can open doors to a world of opportunities.

adults.title: English for Adults
adults.description: Courses designed for both beginners and those with existing knowledge. Our dynamic classes adapt to students' specific needs.
adults.underDevelopment: This page is under development. Detailed information about our adult English program will be available soon.
adults.intro: Looking to learn English for work, travel, or personal goals? Our adult course offers:
adults.approach: We've developed a method that respects each student's pace while focusing on practical results. Our classes blend theory and practice in a supportive environment where you can build your skills with confidence.

practical.title: Practical focus
practical.description: Real-world applications that make learning relevant.

material.title: Current materials
material.description: Resources that address today's communication needs.

levels.title: All proficiency levels
levels.description: Progress at your own pace from beginner to advanced.

networking.title: Community learning
networking.description: Connect with like-minded people and practice English in groups.

advantages.title: Adult course advantages
items: Flexible scheduling for working professionals and students.

cta.title: Ready to advance your career?
cta.description: Contact us to discover how our adult program can transform your personal and professional life.
